005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.ListOptions;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016
017/**
018 * Provides factory methods for Flexmark processing to support HTML-to-markdown
019 * and markdown-to-HTML conversion.
020 */
021@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
022public final class FlexmarkFactory {
023  @NonNull
024  private static final FlexmarkFactory SINGLETON = new FlexmarkFactory();
025  @NonNull
026  private final Parser markdownParser;
027  @NonNull
028  private final HtmlRenderer htmlRenderer;
029  @NonNull
030  private final Formatter formatter;
031  @NonNull
032  private final FlexmarkHtmlConverter htmlConverter;
033  @NonNull
034  final ListOptions listOptions;
035
036  /**
037   * Get the static Flexmark factory instance.
038   *
039   * @return the instance
040   */
041  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidSynchronizedAtMethodLevel")
042  @NonNull
043  public static synchronized FlexmarkFactory instance() {
044    return SINGLETON;
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Get a Flexmark factory instance that uses the provided Flexmark
049   * configuration.
050   *
051   * @param config
052   *          the Flexmark configuration
053   * @return the instance
054   */
055  @NonNull
056  public static FlexmarkFactory newInstance(@NonNull DataHolder config) {
057    return new FlexmarkFactory(config);
058  }
059
060  private FlexmarkFactory() {
061    this(FlexmarkConfiguration.FLEXMARK_CONFIG);
062  }
063
064  @SuppressWarnings("null")
065  private FlexmarkFactory(@NonNull DataHolder config) {
066    this.markdownParser = Parser.builder(config)
067        .customDelimiterProcessor(new FixedEmphasisDelimiterProcessor(Parser.STRONG_WRAPS_EMPHASIS.get(config)))
068        .build();
069    this.htmlRenderer = HtmlRenderer.builder(config).build();
070    this.formatter = Formatter.builder(config).build();
071    this.htmlConverter = FlexmarkHtmlConverter.builder(config).build();
072    this.listOptions = ListOptions.get(config);
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Get configured options for processing HTML and markdown lists.
077   *
078   * @return the options
079   */
080  @NonNull
081  public ListOptions getListOptions() {
082    return listOptions;
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Get the Flexmark markdown parser, which can produce a markdown syntax tree.
087   *
088   * @return the parser
089   */
090  @NonNull
091  public Parser getMarkdownParser() {
092    return markdownParser;
093  }
094
095  /**
096   * Get the Flexmark HTML renderer, which can produce HTML from a markdown syntax
097   * tree.
098   *
099   * @return the parser
100   */
101  @NonNull
102  public HtmlRenderer getHtmlRenderer() {
103    return htmlRenderer;
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * Get the Flexmark formatter, which can produce markdown from a markdown syntax
108   * tree.
109   *
110   * @return the parser
111   */
112  @NonNull
113  public Formatter getFormatter() {
114    return formatter;
115  }
116
117  /**
118   * Get the Flexmark HTML converter, which can produce markdown from HTML
119   * content.
120   *
121   * @return the parser
122   */
123  @NonNull
124  public FlexmarkHtmlConverter getFlexmarkHtmlConverter() {
125    return htmlConverter;
126  }
127}
